preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Collateral';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select o.name as Office, c.external_id as UID, concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', l.account_no as 'Loan Id Number', mpl.name as 'Product Name', l.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', cvs.code_value as Strata, mcm.quality as 'Type of Collateral', ccma.worth_of_collateral as 'Collateral Coverage', '' as OMV, '' as FSV, cvp.code_value as Province, cvd.code_value as District, cvsec.code_value as Sector, cvcell.code_value as Cell, cvv.code_value as Village from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan mpl on l.product_id = mpl.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_loan_collateral_management lcm on lcm.loan_id = l.id left join m_client_collateral_management mccm on lcm.id = mccm.collateral_id left join m_collateral_management mcm on mccm.collateral_id = mcm.id left join m_client_collateral_management_additional_details ccma on ccma.client_collateral_id = lcm.client_collateral_id left join m_code_value cvp on cvp.id = ccma.province_cv_id left join m_code_value cvd on cvd.id = ccma.district_cv_id left join m_code_value cvsec on cvsec.id = ccma.sector_cv_id left join m_code_value cvcell on cvcell.id = ccma.cell_cv_id left join m_code_value cvv on cvv.id = ccma.village_cv_id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (l.fund_id = '${fundId}' or '-1' = '${fundId}') and (l.loan_officer_id = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (ccma.province_cv_id = '${provinceId}' or '-1' = '${provinceId}') GROUP BY o.name, c.external_id, CONCAT(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname), l.account_no, mpl.name, l.principal_amount, mcm.quality, mcm.unit_type, cvp.code_value, cvd.code_value, cvsec.code_value, cvcell.code_value, cvv.code_value,cvs.code_value,ccma.worth_of_collateral

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Secured and Unsecured loan';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select o.name as 'Office', cvl.code_value as 'Location', concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', c.external_id as 'Client UID', l.account_no as 'Loan ID Number', mpl.name as 'Product Name', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Loan Amount', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Disbursed loan amount', if(lc.id is not null, 'Yes', 'No') as 'Collateral', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', l.loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', l.total_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Loan Amount', cvs.code_value as 'Strata' from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan mpl on l.product_id = mpl.id left join m_currency cur on cur.code = l.currency_code left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_loan_collateral_management lc on lc.loan_id = l.id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (l.loan_officer_id = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (l.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') and date(l.disbursedon_date) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}')

column.name: report_id
column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Secured and Unsecured loan')

column.name: parameter_id
column.valueComputed: (select sp.id from stretchy_parameter sp where sp.parameter_name = 'loanProductIdSelectAllWithoutCurrency')

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Loan in arrears Table';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select mc.id AS 'ID', mc.firstname AS 'First Name', mc.middlename AS 'Middle Name', mc.lastname AS 'Last Name', mc.display_name AS 'Full Name', mc.mobile_no AS 'Mobile No', ml.principal_amount AS 'Loan Amount', (IFNULL(ml.principal_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.interest_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.fee_charges_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.penalty_charges_outstanding_derived, 0)) AS 'Loan Outstanding', ml.principal_disbursed_derived AS 'Loan Disbursed', laa.overdue_since_date_derived AS 'Payment Due Date', IFNULL(laa.total_overdue_derived, 0) AS 'Total Due', ounder.id AS 'Office Number', ml.account_no AS 'Account Number', gua.lastname AS 'Guarantor Last Name', COUNT(gua.id) AS 'Number Of Guarantors', g.display_name AS 'Group Name', year(now()) - YEAR(mc.date_of_birth) as 'Age', mc.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', ml.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value as 'Strata' FROM m_office mo JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(mo.hierarchy, '%') INNER JOIN m_client mc ON mc.office_id = ounder.id INNER JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = mc.id INNER JOIN r_enum_value rev ON rev.enum_id = ml.loan_status_id AND rev.enum_name = 'loan_status_id' INNER JOIN m_loan_arrears_aging laa ON laa.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur ON cur.code = ml.currency_code LEFT JOIN m_group_client gc ON gc.client_id = mc.id LEFT JOIN m_group g ON g.id = gc.group_id LEFT JOIN m_staff lo ON lo.id = ml.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_guarantor gua ON gua.loan_id = ml.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = mc.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = mc.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = mc.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE ml.loan_status_id = 300 AND mo.id = ${officeId} AND (IFNULL(ml.loan_officer_id, -10) = ${loanOfficerId} OR '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') AND (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), laa.overdue_since_date_derived) BETWEEN '${fromX}' AND '${toY}') GROUP BY ml.id, ounder.hierarchy, ml.currency_code, mc.account_no, ml.account_no, gua.lastname, g.display_name, cvc.code_value, cvn.code_value, cvl.code_value, cvs.code_value ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, ml.currency_code, mc.account_no, ml.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Obligation Met Loans Details';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select concat(repeat('..', ((LENGTH(ounder.hierarchy) - LENGTH(REPLACE(ounder.hierarchy, '.', '')) - 1))), ounder.name) as 'Office/Branch', ifnull(cur.display_symbol, l.currency_code) as 'Currency', c.account_no as 'Client Account No.', c.display_name as 'Client', l.account_no as 'Loan Account No.', pl.name as 'Product', f.name as 'Fund', l.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', l.total_repayment_derived as 'Total Repaid', l.annual_nominal_interest_rate as 'Annual Nominal Interest Rate', date(l.disbursedon_date) as 'Disbursed', date(l.closedon_date) as 'Closed', l.principal_repaid_derived as 'Principal Repaid', l.interest_repaid_derived as 'Interest Repaid', l.fee_charges_repaid_derived as 'Fees Repaid', l.penalty_charges_repaid_derived as 'Penalties Repaid', lo.display_name as 'Loan Officer', cvl.code_value as 'Location', l.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle' from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id left join m_staff lo on lo.id = l.loan_officer_id left join m_currency cur on cur.code = l.currency_code left join m_fund f on f.id = l.fund_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (ifnull(l.loan_officer_id, -10) = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (ifnull(l.fund_id, -10) = ${fundId} or -1 = ${fundId}) and (ifnull(l.loanpurpose_cv_id, -10) = ${loanPurposeId} or -1 = ${loanPurposeId}) and (case when ${obligDateType} = 1 then l.closedon_date between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' when ${obligDateType} = 2 then l.disbursedon_date between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' else 1 = 1 end) and l.loan_status_id = 600 group by l.id,ounder.hierarchy, l.currency_code, c.account_no, l.account_no,cvl.code_value order by ounder.hierarchy, l.currency_code, c.account_no, l.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Rescheduled Loans';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT concat(repeat('..', ((LENGTH(ounder.hierarchy) - LENGTH(REPLACE(ounder.hierarchy, '.', '')) - 1))), ounder.name) as 'Office/Branch', coalesce(cur.display_symbol, ml.currency_code) as 'Currency', c.account_no as 'Client Account No.', c.display_name AS 'Client Name', ml.account_no AS 'Loan Account No.', mpl.name AS 'Product Name', ml.disbursedon_date AS 'Disbursed Date', lt.transaction_date AS 'Written Off date', ml.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', coalesce(lt.principal_portion_derived, 0) AS 'Rescheduled Principal', coalesce(lt.interest_portion_derived, 0) AS 'Rescheduled Interest', coalesce(lt.fee_charges_portion_derived, 0) AS 'Rescheduled Fees', coalesce(lt.penalty_charges_portion_derived, 0) AS 'Rescheduled Penalties', join_mlrr.comment AS 'Reason For Rescheduling', coalesce(ms.display_name, '-') AS 'Loan Officer Name', extract(year from now()) - extract(year from c.date_of_birth) as 'Age', c.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', ml.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value AS 'Strata', ml.loan_status_id AS 'Loan Status' FROM m_office o JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') AND ounder.hierarchy like CONCAT('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') JOIN m_client c ON c.office_id = ounder.id JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = c.id JOIN m_product_loan mpl ON mpl.id = ml.product_id JOIN m_loan_transaction lt ON lt.loan_id = ml.id JOIN (SELECT MAX(mlrr.id) AS id, mlrr.loan_id, mlrr.reschedule_reason_comment as comment FROM m_loan_reschedule_request mlrr WHERE mlrr.status_enum = 200 GROUP BY mlrr.loan_id, mlrr.reschedule_reason_comment) join_mlrr ON join_mlrr.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_staff ms ON ms.id = ml.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_note n ON n.loan_transaction_id = lt.id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur on cur.code = ml.currency_code left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE lt.is_reversed is false AND o.id = ${officeId} AND (mpl.id = ${loanProductId} OR ${loanProductId} = -1) AND lt.transaction_date BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' AND (ml.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, coalesce(cur.display_symbol, ml.currency_code), ml.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'IC Minutes';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select c.external_id as 'Client UID', concat(c.firstname, c.lastname) as 'Client/Company Name', l.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvg.code_value as 'Gender', cvs.code_value as 'Strata', cvb.code_value as 'Business Sector', loanPurposeTble.code_value as 'Purpose of the loan', l.principal_amount_proposed as 'Applied Amount', icReviewTbl.IC_Level_One as 'IC Decision Level One', icReviewTbl.IC_Level_Two as 'IC Decision Level Two', icReviewTbl.IC_Level_Three as 'IC Decision Level Three', icReviewTbl.IC_Level_Four as 'IC Decision Level Four', icReviewTbl.IC_Level_Five as 'IC Decision Level Five', l.approved_principal as 'IC Approved Amount', l.term_frequency as 'Loan Tenure in months', '' as 'IC Approved Amount in Words', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Installment Amount', l.penalty_charges_charged_derived as 'Late Fees', coi.tax_identification_number as 'Company Tin Number', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', villageTbl.code_value as 'Village', cellTbl.code_value as 'Cell', cvb.code_value as 'Sector', districtTbl.code_value as 'District', coi.telephone_no as 'Contact Number', coi.co_signors as 'Cosigner Number', l.account_no as 'Loan ID Number', coi.bank_account_number as 'Bank Account Number', coi.bank_name as 'Bank Name', ccma.UPI_NO as 'UPI Number', cvp.code_value as 'Province', ccma.collateral_owner_first as 'Owners Name 1', ccma.collateral_owner_second as 'Owners Name 2', ccma.id_no_of_collateral_owner_first as 'Owners ID 1', ccma.id_no_of_collateral_owner_second as 'Owners ID 2', '' as 'OMV Figures', '' as 'OMV in letters', coi.guarantor as 'Witness Name' from m_office o join m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') AND ounder.hierarchy like CONCAT('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c ON c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l ON l.client_id = c.id left join m_loan_arrears_aging laa on laa.loan_id = l.id join m_product_loan p ON p.id = l.product_id left join m_code_value cvg ON cvg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_other_info coi ON coi.client_id = c.id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvn ON cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs ON cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_business_detail bd on bd.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvb on cvb.id = bd.business_type_id left join m_loan_collateral_management lcm on lcm.loan_id = l.id left join m_client_collateral_management_additional_details ccma on ccma.client_collateral_id = lcm.client_collateral_id left join m_code_value cvp on cvp.id = ccma.province_cv_id left join m_code_value loanPurposeTble on loanPurposeTble.id = l.loanpurpose_cv_id left join m_code_value villageTbl on villageTbl.id = ccma.village_cv_id left join m_code_value districtTbl on districtTbl.id = ccma.district_cv_id left join m_code_value cellTbl on cellTbl.id = ccma.cell_cv_id left join (select ld.loan_id, case when ld.loan_decision_state = 1000 then 'Review Application' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1200 then 'Due Diligence' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1300 then 'Collateral Review' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1400 then 'IC Review Level One' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1500 then 'IC Review Level Two' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1600 then 'IC Review Level Three' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1700 then 'IC Review Level Four' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1800 then 'IC Review Level Five' when ld.loan_decision_state = 1900 then 'Prepare And Sign Contract' end as loanDecisionState, ld.next_loan_ic_review_decision_state as 'Next IC Level', if(ld.is_ic_review_decision_level_one_signed = true, 'Approved', if(ld.is_reject_ic_review_decision_level_one = true, 'Rejected', '')) as 'IC_Level_One', if(ld.is_ic_review_decision_level_two_signed = true, 'Approved', if(ld.is_reject_ic_review_decision_level_two = true, 'Rejected', '')) as 'IC_Level_Two', if(ld.is_ic_review_decision_level_three_signed = true, 'Approved', if(ld.is_reject_ic_review_decision_level_three = true, 'Rejected', '')) as 'IC_Level_Three', if(ld.is_ic_review_decision_level_four_signed = true, 'Approved', if(ld.is_reject_ic_review_decision_level_four = true, 'Rejected', '')) as 'IC_Level_Four', if(ld.is_ic_review_decision_level_five_signed = true, 'Approved', if(ld.is_reject_ic_review_decision_level_five = true, 'Rejected', '')) as 'IC_Level_Five' from m_loan_decision ld) as icReviewTbl on icReviewTbl.loan_id = l.id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (ifnull(l.loan_officer_id, -10) = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (ifnull(l.fund_id, -10) = ${fundId} or -1 = ${fundId}) and (ifnull(l.loanpurpose_cv_id, -10) = ${loanPurposeId} or -1 = ${loanPurposeId}) and (date(l.submittedon_date) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}'))

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Secured and Unsecured loan';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select o.name as 'Office', cvl.code_value as 'Location', concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', c.external_id as 'Client UID', FLOOR(DATEDIFF(NOW(), c.date_of_birth) / 365) as 'Age', l.account_no as 'Loan ID Number', mpl.name as 'Product Name', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Loan Amount', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Disbursed loan amount', if(lc.id is not null, 'Yes', 'No') as 'Collateral', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', l.loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', l.total_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Loan Amount', l.term_frequency as 'Loan Tenure in months', cvs.code_value as 'Strata' from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan mpl on l.product_id = mpl.id left join m_currency cur on cur.code = l.currency_code left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_loan_collateral_management lc on lc.loan_id = l.id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (l.loan_officer_id = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (l.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') and date(l.disbursedon_date) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}')

column.name: parameter_label
column.value: Is Collateral

column.name: parameter_sql
column.value: select * from (select -1 as id, 'All' as name union all select 100 as id, 'Yes' as name union all select 200 as id, 'No' as name) x order by x.id

column.name: report_id
column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Secured and Unsecured loan')

column.name: parameter_id
column.valueComputed: (select sp.id from stretchy_parameter sp where sp.parameter_name = 'isCollateral')

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Secured and Unsecured loan';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select o.name as 'Office', cvl.code_value as 'Location', concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', c.external_id as 'Client UID', FLOOR(DATEDIFF(NOW(), c.date_of_birth) / 365) as 'Age', l.account_no as 'Loan ID Number', mpl.name as 'Product Name', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Loan Amount', l.principal_disbursed_derived as 'Disbursed loan amount', if(lc.id is not null, 'Yes', 'No') as 'Collateral', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', l.loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', l.total_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Loan Amount', l.term_frequency as 'Loan Tenure in months', cvs.code_value as 'Strata' from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan mpl on l.product_id = mpl.id left join m_currency cur on cur.code = l.currency_code left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_loan_collateral_management lc on lc.loan_id = l.id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (l.loan_officer_id = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (l.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') and date(l.disbursedon_date) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}') AND ( CASE WHEN '${isCollateral}' = 100 THEN lc.id IS NOT NULL WHEN '${isCollateral}' = 200 THEN lc.id IS NULL ELSE TRUE END )

column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Loan fully repaid Table')

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Loan fully repaid Table';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT c.id AS 'id', c.firstname AS 'firstName', c.middlename AS 'middleName', c.lastname AS 'lastName', c.display_name AS 'fullName', c.mobile_no AS 'mobileNo', l.principal_amount AS 'loanAmount', (IFNULL(l.principal_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(l.interest_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(l.fee_charges_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(l.penalty_charges_outstanding_derived, 0)) AS 'loanOutstanding', l.principal_disbursed_derived AS 'loanDisbursed', o.id AS 'officeNumber', l.account_no AS 'loanAccountId', gua.lastname AS 'guarantorLastName', COUNT(gua.id) AS 'numberOfGuarantors', l.maturedon_date AS 'dueDate', laa.total_overdue_derived AS 'totalDue', gp.display_name AS 'groupName', l.total_repayment_derived AS 'totalFullyPaid', year(now()) - YEAR(c.date_of_birth) as 'Age', c.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', l.loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value AS 'Strata' FROM m_office o JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(o.hierarchy, '%') JOIN m_client c ON c.office_id = ounder.id JOIN m_loan l ON l.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN m_staff lo ON lo.id = l.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur ON cur.code = l.currency_code LEFT JOIN m_group_client gc ON gc.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN m_group gp ON gp.id = l.group_id LEFT JOIN m_guarantor gua ON gua.loan_id = l.id LEFT JOIN m_loan_arrears_aging laa ON laa.loan_id = l.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE o.id = ${officeId} AND (IFNULL(l.loan_officer_id, -10) = ${loanOfficerId} OR '-1' = ${loanOfficerId}) AND date(l.closedon_date) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}') AND (l.loan_status_id IN (600, 700)) GROUP BY l.id, ounder.hierarchy, l.currency_code, c.account_no, l.account_no, gua.lastname, l.maturedon_date, cvc.code_value, cvn.code_value, cvl.code_value, cvs.code_value ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, l.currency_code, c.account_no, l.account_no

column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Loan in arrears Table')

column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Loan in arrears Table')

column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Loan in arrears Table')

column.valueComputed: (select sr.id from stretchy_report sr where sr.report_name ='Loan in arrears Table')

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Loan in arrears Table';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select mc.id AS 'ID', mc.firstname AS 'First Name', mc.middlename AS 'Middle Name', mc.lastname AS 'Last Name', mc.display_name AS 'Full Name', mc.mobile_no AS 'Mobile No', ml.principal_amount AS 'Loan Amount', (IFNULL(ml.principal_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.interest_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.fee_charges_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(ml.penalty_charges_outstanding_derived, 0)) AS 'Loan Outstanding', ml.principal_disbursed_derived AS 'Loan Disbursed', laa.overdue_since_date_derived AS 'Payment Due Date', IFNULL(laa.total_overdue_derived, 0) AS 'Total Due', ounder.id AS 'Office Number', ml.account_no AS 'Account Number', gua.lastname AS 'Guarantor Last Name', COUNT(gua.id) AS 'Number Of Guarantors', g.display_name AS 'Group Name', year(now()) - YEAR(mc.date_of_birth) as 'Age', mc.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', ml.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value as 'Strata' FROM m_office mo JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(mo.hierarchy, '%') INNER JOIN m_client mc ON mc.office_id = ounder.id INNER JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = mc.id INNER JOIN r_enum_value rev ON rev.enum_id = ml.loan_status_id AND rev.enum_name = 'loan_status_id' INNER JOIN m_loan_arrears_aging laa ON laa.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur ON cur.code = ml.currency_code LEFT JOIN m_group_client gc ON gc.client_id = mc.id LEFT JOIN m_group g ON g.id = gc.group_id LEFT JOIN m_staff lo ON lo.id = ml.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_guarantor gua ON gua.loan_id = ml.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = mc.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = mc.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = mc.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE ml.loan_status_id = 300 AND mo.id = ${officeId} AND (IFNULL(ml.loan_officer_id, -10) = ${loanOfficerId} OR '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') AND date(laa.overdue_since_date_derived) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}') GROUP BY ml.id, ounder.hierarchy, ml.currency_code, mc.account_no, ml.account_no, gua.lastname, g.display_name, cvc.code_value, cvn.code_value, cvl.code_value, cvs.code_value ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, ml.currency_code, mc.account_no, ml.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Collateral';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select o.name as Office, c.external_id as UID, concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', l.account_no as 'Loan Id Number', mpl.name as 'Product Name', l.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', cvs.code_value as Strata, mcm.quality as 'Type of Collateral', ccma.worth_of_collateral as 'Collateral Coverage', '' as OMV, '' as FSV, cvp.code_value as Province, cvd.code_value as District, cvsec.code_value as Sector, cvcell.code_value as Cell, cvv.code_value as Village from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan mpl on l.product_id = mpl.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_client_collateral_management mccm on c.id = mccm.client_id left join m_loan_collateral_management lcm on mccm.id = lcm.client_collateral_id left join m_collateral_management mcm on mccm.collateral_id = mcm.id left join m_client_collateral_management_additional_details ccma on ccma.client_collateral_id = lcm.client_collateral_id left join m_code_value cvp on cvp.id = ccma.province_cv_id left join m_code_value cvd on cvd.id = ccma.district_cv_id left join m_code_value cvsec on cvsec.id = ccma.sector_cv_id left join m_code_value cvcell on cvcell.id = ccma.cell_cv_id left join m_code_value cvv on cvv.id = ccma.village_cv_id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (l.fund_id = '${fundId}' or '-1' = '${fundId}') and (l.loan_officer_id = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (ccma.province_cv_id = '${provinceId}' or '-1' = '${provinceId}') GROUP BY o.name, c.external_id, CONCAT(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname), l.account_no, mpl.name, l.principal_amount, mcm.quality, mcm.unit_type, cvp.code_value, cvd.code_value, cvsec.code_value, cvcell.code_value, cvv.code_value, cvs.code_value, ccma.worth_of_collateral

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Loan fully repaid Table';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT c.id AS 'id', c.firstname AS 'firstName', c.middlename AS 'middleName', c.lastname AS 'lastName', c.display_name AS 'fullName', c.mobile_no AS 'mobileNo', l.principal_amount AS 'loanAmount', (IFNULL(l.principal_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(l.interest_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(l.fee_charges_outstanding_derived, 0) + IFNULL(l.penalty_charges_outstanding_derived, 0)) AS 'loanOutstanding', l.principal_disbursed_derived AS 'loanDisbursed', o.id AS 'officeNumber', l.account_no AS 'loanAccountId', gua.lastname AS 'guarantorLastName', COUNT(gua.id) AS 'numberOfGuarantors', l.maturedon_date AS 'dueDate', laa.total_overdue_derived AS 'totalDue', gp.display_name AS 'groupName', l.total_repayment_derived AS 'totalFullyPaid', year(now()) - YEAR(c.date_of_birth) as 'Age', c.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', l.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value AS 'Strata' FROM m_office o JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(o.hierarchy, '%') JOIN m_client c ON c.office_id = ounder.id JOIN m_loan l ON l.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN m_staff lo ON lo.id = l.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur ON cur.code = l.currency_code LEFT JOIN m_group_client gc ON gc.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN m_group gp ON gp.id = l.group_id LEFT JOIN m_guarantor gua ON gua.loan_id = l.id LEFT JOIN m_loan_arrears_aging laa ON laa.loan_id = l.id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE o.id = ${officeId} AND (IFNULL(l.loan_officer_id, -10) = ${loanOfficerId} OR '-1' = ${loanOfficerId}) AND date(l.closedon_date) between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}') AND (l.loan_status_id IN (600, 700)) GROUP BY l.id, ounder.hierarchy, l.currency_code, c.account_no, l.account_no, gua.lastname, l.maturedon_date, cvc.code_value, cvn.code_value, cvl.code_value, cvs.code_value ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, l.currency_code, c.account_no, l.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Rescheduled Loans';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT concat(repeat('..', ((LENGTH(ounder.hierarchy) - LENGTH(REPLACE(ounder.hierarchy, '.', '')) - 1))), ounder.name) as 'Office/Branch', coalesce(cur.display_symbol, ml.currency_code) as 'Currency', c.account_no as 'Client Account No.', c.display_name AS 'Client Name', ml.account_no AS 'Loan Account No.', mpl.name AS 'Product Name', ml.disbursedon_date AS 'Disbursed Date', ml.writtenoffon_date AS 'Written Off date', ml.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', join_mlrr.reason AS 'Reason For Rescheduling', coalesce(ms.display_name, '-') AS 'Loan Officer Name', extract(year from now()) - extract(year from c.date_of_birth) as 'Age', c.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', ml.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value AS 'Strata', ml.loan_status_id AS 'Loan Status' FROM m_office o JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') AND ounder.hierarchy like CONCAT('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') JOIN m_client c ON c.office_id = ounder.id JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = c.id JOIN m_product_loan mpl ON mpl.id = ml.product_id JOIN (SELECT MAX(mlrr.id) AS id, mlrr.loan_id, cvs.code_value as reason,mlrr.reschedule_from_date as rescheduleDate FROM m_loan_reschedule_request mlrr left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = mlrr.reschedule_reason_cv_id WHERE mlrr.status_enum = 200 GROUP BY mlrr.loan_id, cvs.code_value,mlrr.reschedule_from_date) join_mlrr ON join_mlrr.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_staff ms ON ms.id = ml.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur on cur.code = ml.currency_code left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE o.id = ${officeId} AND (mpl.id = ${loanProductId} OR ${loanProductId} = -1) AND join_mlrr.rescheduleDate BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' AND (ml.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, coalesce(cur.display_symbol, ml.currency_code), ml.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Client Statement';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select l.id, o.name as Office, cvl.code_value as 'Client Location', c.external_id as UID, concat(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', l.account_no as 'Loan Id Number', l.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', l.interest_charged_derived as Interest, l.term_frequency as 'Total Payments', l.principal_repaid_derived as 'Total Principal Paid', l.fee_charges_repaid_derived as 'Total Fees Paid', l.interest_repaid_derived as 'Total Interest Paid', l.penalty_charges_charged_derived as 'Total Late Fees', l.total_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Balance', l.interest_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Interest', l.fee_charges_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Fees', cvs.code_value as 'Client Classification', case when (con.enabled = false) then loanStatusTable.loanStatus when con.enabled = true then case when loanStatusTable.loanStatus = 'Pending Approval' and loanStatusTable.loanDecisionState is null then loanStatusTable.loanStatus when loanStatusTable.loanStatus = 'Pending Approval' and loanStatusTable.loanDecisionState is not null and loanStatusTable.loanDecisionState != 'Prepare And Sign Contract' then loanStatusTable.loanDecisionState when loanStatusTable.loanStatus != 'Pending Approval' then loanStatusTable.loanStatus when loanStatusTable.loanStatus = 'Pending Approval' and loanStatusTable.loanDecisionState = 'Prepare And Sign Contract' then loanStatusTable.loanStatus end end as 'Status', YEAR(now()) - YEAR(c.date_of_birth) as Age, cvg.code_value as Gender, cvc.code_value as Cohort, l.generic_loan_counter as Cycle, cvn.code_value as Nationality, cvl.code_value as Location from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_code_value cvg on cvg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_fund f on f.id = l.fund_id left join m_staff lo on lo.id = l.loan_officer_id left join m_loan_decision ld on ld.loan_id = l.id left join c_configuration con on con.name = 'Add-More-Stages-To-A-Loan-Life-Cycle' left join (select l.id as loanId, case when l.loan_status_id = 100 then 'Pending Approval' when l.loan_status_id = 200 then 'Approval' when l.loan_status_id = 300 then 'Active' when l.loan_status_id = 303 then 'Transfer In Progress' when l.loan_status_id = 304 then 'Transfer On Hold' when l.loan_status_id = 400 then 'Withdrawn By Client' when l.loan_status_id = 500 then 'Rejected' when l.loan_status_id = 600 then 'Closed Obligations Met' when l.loan_status_id = 601 then 'Closed Written Off' when l.loan_status_id = 602 then 'Closed Reschedule Outstanding Amount' when l.loan_status_id = 700 then 'Overpaid' end as loanStatus, case when l.loan_decision_state = 1000 then 'Review Application' when l.loan_decision_state = 1200 then 'Due Diligence' when l.loan_decision_state = 1300 then 'Collateral Review' when l.loan_decision_state = 1400 then 'IC Review Level One' when l.loan_decision_state = 1500 then 'IC Review Level Two' when l.loan_decision_state = 1600 then 'IC Review Level Three' when l.loan_decision_state = 1700 then 'IC Review Level Four' when l.loan_decision_state = 1800 then 'IC Review Level Five' when l.loan_decision_state = 1900 then 'Prepare And Sign Contract' end as loanDecisionState from m_loan l left join m_loan_decision ld on ld.loan_id = l.id) as loanStatusTable on loanStatusTable.loanId = l.id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = '${loanProductId}' or '-1' = '${loanProductId}') and (l.fund_id = '${fundId}' or '-1' = '${fundId}') and (ifnull(l.loan_officer_id, -10) = '${loanOfficerId}' or '-1' = '${loanOfficerId}') and (l.disbursedon_date between date('${startDate}') and date('${endDate}')) and (c.id = '${clientId}' or '-1' = '${clientId}')

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Rescheduled Loans';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT concat(repeat('..', ((LENGTH(ounder.hierarchy) - LENGTH(REPLACE(ounder.hierarchy, '.', '')) - 1))), ounder.name) as 'Office/Branch', coalesce(cur.display_symbol, ml.currency_code) as 'Currency', c.account_no as 'Client Account No.', c.display_name AS 'Client Name', ml.account_no AS 'Loan Account No.', mpl.name AS 'Product Name', ml.disbursedon_date AS 'Disbursed Date', ml.writtenoffon_date AS 'Written Off date', join_mlrr.rescheduleDate AS 'Reschedule Date', ml.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', join_mlrr.reason AS 'Reason For Rescheduling', coalesce(ms.display_name, '-') AS 'Loan Officer Name', extract(year from now()) - extract(year from c.date_of_birth) as 'Age', c.external_id as 'Client UID', cdg.code_value as 'Gender', cvc.code_value as 'Cohort', ml.generic_loan_counter as 'Cycle', cvn.code_value as 'Nationality', cvl.code_value as 'Location', cvs.code_value AS 'Strata', ml.loan_status_id AS 'Loan Status', join_mlrr.submittedOnDate AS 'Reschedule Request Date' FROM m_office o JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') AND ounder.hierarchy like CONCAT('${currentUserHierarchy}', '%') JOIN m_client c ON c.office_id = ounder.id JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = c.id JOIN m_product_loan mpl ON mpl.id = ml.product_id JOIN (SELECT MAX(mlrr.id) AS id, mlrr.loan_id, cvs.code_value as reason,mlrr.reschedule_from_date as rescheduleDate,mlrr.submitted_on_date AS submittedOnDate FROM m_loan_reschedule_request mlrr left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = mlrr.reschedule_reason_cv_id WHERE mlrr.status_enum = 200 GROUP BY mlrr.loan_id, cvs.code_value,mlrr.reschedule_from_date,mlrr.submitted_on_date) join_mlrr ON join_mlrr.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_staff ms ON ms.id = ml.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_currency cur on cur.code = ml.currency_code left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cdg on cdg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id WHERE o.id = ${officeId} AND (mpl.id = ${loanProductId} OR ${loanProductId} = -1) AND join_mlrr.submittedOnDate BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' AND (ml.currency_code = '${currencyId}' or '-1' = '${currencyId}') ORDER BY ounder.hierarchy, coalesce(cur.display_symbol, ml.currency_code), ml.account_no

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'ClientTrendsByDay';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT COUNT(cl.id) AS count, cl.activation_date AS days FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl on x.id = cl.office_id WHERE x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) AND (cl.activation_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 DAY) AND DATE(NOW()- INTERVAL 1 DAY)) GROUP BY days

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'LoanTrendsByDay';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT COUNT(ln.id) AS lcount, ln.disbursedon_date AS days FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl on x.id = cl.office_id LEFT JOIN m_loan ln on cl.id = ln.client_id WHERE x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) AND (ln.disbursedon_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 DAY) AND DATE(NOW()- INTERVAL 1 DAY)) GROUP BY days

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'ClientTrendsByMonth';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT COUNT(cl.id) AS count, MONTHNAME(cl.activation_date) AS Months FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl on x.id = cl.office_id WHERE x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) AND (cl.activation_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND DATE(NOW())) GROUP BY Months

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'LoanTrendsByMonth';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT COUNT(ln.id) AS lcount, MONTHNAME(ln.disbursedon_date) AS Months FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl on x.id = cl.office_id LEFT JOIN m_loan ln on cl.id = ln.client_id WHERE x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) AND (ln.disbursedon_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND DATE(NOW())) GROUP BY Months

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'ClientTrendsByWeek';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT COUNT(cl.id) AS count, WEEK(cl.activation_date) AS Weeks FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl on x.id = cl.office_id WHERE x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) AND (cl.activation_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 WEEK) AND DATE(NOW())) GROUP BY Weeks

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'LoanTrendsByWeek';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: SELECT COUNT(ln.id) AS lcount, WEEK(ln.disbursedon_date) AS Weeks FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl on x.id = cl.office_id LEFT JOIN m_loan ln on cl.id = ln.client_id WHERE x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) AND (ln.disbursedon_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 WEEK) AND DATE(NOW())) GROUP BY Weeks

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Demand_Vs_Collection';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select amount.AmountDue-amount.AmountPaid as AmountDue, amount.AmountPaid as AmountPaid from (SELECT (IFNULL(SUM(ls.principal_amount),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.principal_writtenoff_derived),0) + IFNULL(SUM(ls.interest_amount),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.interest_writtenoff_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.interest_waived_derived),0) + IFNULL(SUM(ls.fee_charges_amount),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.fee_charges_writtenoff_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.fee_charges_waived_derived),0) + IFNULL(SUM(ls.penalty_charges_amount),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.penalty_charges_writtenoff_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.penalty_charges_waived_derived),0)) AS AmountDue, (IFNULL(SUM(ls.principal_completed_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.principal_writtenoff_derived),0) + IFNULL(SUM(ls.interest_completed_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.interest_writtenoff_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.interest_waived_derived),0) + IFNULL(SUM(ls.fee_charges_completed_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.fee_charges_writtenoff_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.fee_charges_waived_derived),0) + IFNULL(SUM(ls.penalty_charges_completed_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.penalty_charges_writtenoff_derived),0) - IFNULL(SUM(ls.penalty_charges_waived_derived),0) ) AS AmountPaid FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl ON x.id = cl.office_id LEFT JOIN m_loan ln ON cl.id = ln.client_id LEFT JOIN m_loan_repayment_schedule ls ON ln.id = ls.loan_id WHERE ls.duedate = DATE(NOW()) AND (x.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT ino.hierarchy FROM m_office ino WHERE ino.id = ${officeId}),'%'))) as amount

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(1) from stretchy_report where report_name = 'Disbursal_Vs_Awaitingdisbursal';

column.name: report_sql
column.value: select awaitinddisbursal.amount-disbursedAmount.amount as amountToBeDisburse, disbursedAmount.amount as disbursedAmount from ( SELECT COUNT(ln.id) AS noOfLoans, IFNULL(SUM(ln.principal_amount),0) AS amount FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl ON cl.office_id = x.id LEFT JOIN m_loan ln ON cl.id = ln.client_id WHERE ln.expected_disbursedon_date = DATE(NOW()) AND (ln.loan_status_id=200 OR ln.loan_status_id=300) AND x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) ) awaitinddisbursal, ( SELECT COUNT(ltrxn.id) as count, IFNULL(SUM(ltrxn.amount),0) as amount FROM m_office x LEFT JOIN m_client cl ON cl.office_id = x.id LEFT JOIN m_loan ln ON cl.id = ln.client_id LEFT JOIN m_loan_transaction ltrxn ON ln.id = ltrxn.loan_id WHERE ltrxn.transaction_date = DATE(NOW()) AND ltrxn.is_reversed = 0 AND ltrxn.transaction_type_enum=1 AND x.hierarchy like concat((select ino.hierarchy from m_office ino where ino.id = ${officeId}),'%' ) ) disbursedAmount

changeSet.author: bosco@fiter.io
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE acc_gl_journal_entry ALTER COLUMN odoo_journal_id TYPE VARCHAR(255);

changeSet.author: bosco@fiter.io
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE acc_gl_journal_entry MODIFY COLUMN odoo_journal_id VARCHAR(255);
